::Koj::

Koj gets hit by the Tramer and feels very strange inside his anger starts to 
Boil inside him. And Flys up high and races toward Snowcat with Fury.

Inu-yasha

"Damn he got Koj in his control maximal avoid him at all cost please." I 
have a plan.

                ::The Universe within the self::
::Koj::

Koj drifts down into a endless waltz of darkness "Where am I?"

::Lilly::

As giant Image of Lilly apears in the darkness "Koj you forgot me you broke 
your promise your no hero your to much of a coward to try." As her image 
fades

::Koj::
"Lilly no don't leave me again!"

::Fe-Ling::

The Image of Lilly fades into ninja master Fe-Ling "You have no honor you 
are my worst student you can never be the Silver Dragon Ninja you can't even 
be a man."

::Koj::

"I just want to rest please I tried forgive me that all I can do."
